ChangeRequestRelatedIssue.name: ChangeRequestRelatedIssue
ChangeRequestRelatedIssue.description: Represents a junction object that relates a ChangeRequest to an Incident or Problem due to a service failure.

ChangeRequestId.description: The ChangeRequest ID that's linked to the Problem or Incident.

Name.description: A description of the change request as it relates to the problem or incident.

RelatedEntityType.description: The name of the related object type.

RelatedIssueId.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents the related Problem or Incident.

RelationshipType.description: Shows how the ChangeRequest and Incident or Problem records relate to each other.
